passage_text: Answer. You can open the capsules and mix them with some food as long as you can be sure that your daughter will take the entire dose. My only concern is that you will not be able to mask the taste of the cephalexin and it will be difficult to get her to take the medicine mixture. The medicine would need to be consumed within 15 to 20 minutes of mixing it with the food you choose to avoid chemical changes to the drug also.

Marvell. Yes, you can open the Keflex capsule and take the contents. However, that way you may miss some of the dose if all the contents of what you mixed it in don't get eaten. And the taste of the antibiotic powder may not be so nice. Votes: +1.
As for breaking open a capsule, ask your doctor. If you swallow it as powder there may be a problem with damage to your esophagus if the medicine is caustic in any way.
